etymology.description: semantic: 甲 'fan' + 𠂇 'hand'—a man holding a fan, indicating a servant.
etymology.interpretation: A hand holding a fan evokes the image of a servant, someone of low status, hence the sense of 'low; humble.' By extension it refers to modesty or an inferior position or attitude.

examples.chinese: 他出身卑微(他出身卑微)，但从不自卑(但從不自卑)。
examples.pinyin: Tā chūshēn bēiwēi, dàn cóng bù zìbēi.
examples.english: He was born into a lowly background, but he is never self-abasing.

examples.chinese: 他为人谦卑(他為人謙卑)，尊重每个人(尊重每個人)。
examples.pinyin: Tā wéirén qiānbēi, zūnzhòng měi gèrén.
examples.english: He is humble and respects everyone.

examples.chinese: 我们鄙视卑鄙的行为(我們鄙視卑鄙的行為)。
